CustomField.description: Specifies the notification recipients for Create Billing Documents batch notifications sent via Chatter or email. The value is a list of email addresses separated by semicolons (;). This setting is null by default.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specifies the notification recipients for Create Billing Documents batch notifications sent via Chatter or email. The value is a list of email addresses separated by semicolons (;). This setting is null by default.
CustomField.label: Notification Recipients
